getActiveAgentsPaginated(string,uint256,.details: AUDIT FIX: Added pagination for large lists

getCheapestAgent(string).details: AUDIT FIX: Added loop limit to prevent out-of-gas

recordTaskCompletion(uint256).details: AUDIT FIX: Added onlyEscrow modifier to prevent reputation manipulation

params.name: Human-readable agent name
params.pricePerTask: Price in USDC (18 decimals) per task

getActiveAgentsPaginated(string,uint256,.notice: Get active agents for a service type with pagination

getAgentIdByWallet(address).notice: Get agent ID by wallet address

getAgentsByService(string).notice: Get all agents offering a specific service type

getCheapestAgent(string).notice: Get cheapest active agent for a service type

recordTaskCompletion(uint256).notice: Record a completed task (only callable by escrow contract)

registerAgent(string,string,uint256).notice: Register a new agent with a service offering

updateAgent(uint256,bool).notice: Update agent price and active status
